name: visual-display
description: Welcome to your new Jekyll theme! In this directory, you'll find the files you need to be able to package up your theme into a gem. Put your layouts in `_layouts`, your includes in `_includes` and your sass in `_sass`. To experiment with this code, add some sample content and run `bundle exec jekyll serve` â€“ this directory is setup just like a Jekyll site!

scripts.postinstall: cp node_modules/tufte-css/*.css assets/css/ && cp node_modules/instant.page/instantpage.js assets/js/instantpage.js
